name: Binance
notes: Commonly reported to run in AWS Tokyo (ap-northeast-1) for many trading endpoints (community / latency analyses).

name: Bybit
notes: Bybit FAQ explicitly references AWS Singapore as server location.

name: OKX
notes: Public IP lookups and community sources indicate AWS hosting in Asia (ap-east-1 / Hong Kong) or multi-cloud connectivity.

name: Deribit
notes: Deribit documentation references Equinix LD4 (Slough/London) as a primary data center.

name: Coinbase
notes: Coinbase uses major colocation facilities and cloud providers (AWS widely used); regional coordinates are approximate.

name: Kraken
notes: Kraken is commonly represented as using European AWS regions (Frankfurt) for European services.

name: Bitfinex
notes: Bitfinex has been reported to use GCP in certain regions; mapping is approximate.

name: KuCoin
notes: KuCoin location info not public; Singapore is a practical approximation for APAC endpoints.

name: Huobi
notes: Huobi historically uses various APAC data centers (approximate).

name: Gate.io
notes: Gate.io public hosting details are not authoritative; Taipei/Singapore used as reasonable APAC approximations.

name: Bitstamp
notes: Bitstamp historically uses European colocation / data centers; Frankfurt/Berlin/Amsterdam approximations.

name: Gemini
notes: Gemini likely uses US cloud providers and colocation for trading services; approximation: east coast US.

name: Bittrex
notes: Bittrex hosting not clearly published — US region approximation used.

name: Poloniex
notes: Poloniex hosting information not public; US-east used as a general approximation.

name: BitMEX
notes: BitMEX historically colocated in London / datacentre hubs; approximate.

name: OKCoin
notes: OKCoin has global presence; US-west used as a practical approximation for some services.

name: Coincheck
notes: Japan-based exchange — Tokyo region is a natural approximation.

name: MEXC
notes: MEXC operates APAC-facing endpoints; Singapore used as approximation.

name: Liquid
notes: Liquid uses Tokyo and Singapore infrastructures historically.

name: Bitrue
notes: Bitrue hosting not public; Singapore used as APAC approximation.
